enchantment.enchantedshulkers.siphon.des: Picked up items go in the storage if it already contains a similar item.
enchantment.enchantedshulkers.refill.des: Refills your held item from its inventory after use.
text.autoconfig.enchantedshulkers.title: Enchanted Shulkers Client Settings
text.autoconfig.enchantedshulkers.option: Applies the enchantment glint to enchanted shulker boxes
and ender chests that are placed in the world
Prevent glint overlap with custom models
Uses different block models and textures for closed containers
to prevent overlapping glint. This does not change the look
of closed containers, but always uses the vanilla textures,
so you should disable this when using a custom resource pack.
This option only has effect when the above option is on
